Articles.Content: I can't seem to destroy debris in kerbin orbit. I can click it, confirm destruction, but nothing happens...

2 minutes ago, modus said:

I can't seem to destroy debris in kerbin orbit. I can click it, confirm destruction, but nothing happens...

Thread moved from KSP 2 Discussion to KSP 2 Technical support.
had the same issue as well
And you know, I'm actually not sure if there is any debris at all. I can't focus or load to it or anything.
Same problem, this is gong to get messy.
same problem, but you can destroy debris in the map view, it's only the tracking station that doesn't work
I also have this issue. along with a few other bugs

I have the same issues, but its much worser than you described.

Staged parts in suborbit do not land on kerbal and neither get destroyed, so I already cannot use launchpad 1 as there is some debris above which refuses to come down or get destroyed
Yeah also had that. I could clear the launchpad when I clicked it in the regular KSC view.

Rather than selecting the debris from the list on the left and destroying it, actually right clicking on the icon in orbit in the tracking station and destroying it through that seems to work for me!

Edited March 5, 2023 by Alpha42

I'm having the same problem.

Send a bug report to 

https://support.privatedivision.com/hc/en-us/requests/
